an11.5:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
an11.5:1.3: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ,
an11.5:1.4: pāmojje asati pāmojjavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti pīti,
an11.5:1.5: pītiyā asati pītivipannassa hatūpanisā hoti passaddhi,
an11.5:1.6: passaddhiyā asati passaddhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti sukhaṁ,
an11.5:1.7: sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi,
an11.5:1.8: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ,
an11.5:1.9: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti nibbidā,
an11.5:1.10: nibbidāya asati nibbidāvipannassa hatūpaniso hoti virāgo,
an11.5:1.11: virāge asati virāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an11.5:2.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṁ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi na pāripūriṁ gacchati.
an11.5:2.2: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.5:2.3: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ …pe…
an11.5:3.1: Sīlavato, āvuso, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.5:3.2: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ,
an11.5:3.3: pāmojje sati pāmojjasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti pīti,
an11.5:3.4: pītiyā sati pītisampannassa upanisasampannā hoti passaddhi,
an11.5:3.5: passaddhiyā sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti sukhaṁ,
an11.5:3.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi,
an11.5:3.7: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ,
an11.5:3.8: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti nibbidā,
an11.5:3.9: nibbidāya sati nibbidāsampannassa upanisasampanno hoti virāgo,
an11.5:3.10: virāge sati virāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an11.5:4.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṁ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi pāripūriṁ gacchati.
an11.5:4.2: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.5:4.3: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ …pe…
